current_projects.title: Perceptar - Virtual Reality Experience
current_projects.description: A virtual reality experience exploring the concept of a 'Perceptar' - a creature that exists in the intersection of human and animal consciousness.

current_projects.title: AltruData
current_projects.description: A project leveraging trustworthy AI and confidential computing to generate reliable data for marketing analysis.

current_projects.title: See Museum
current_projects.description: An AI-assisted online art museum that customizes exhibitions for users and employs AI agents to answer questions about artworks. I served as the front-end developer building core functionality for the exhibition show page.

self_projects.title: Embodied Interaction
self_projects.description: Exploring the relationship between physical movement and digital interfaces through gesture-based interaction design.

self_projects.title: A way out of Ontological World
self_projects.description: Exploring futurism, consciousness, and algorithm ethics in a philosophical context.

self_projects.title: Algorithm Ethic
self_projects.description: Examining ethical considerations in algorithms through immersive experiences.

self_projects.title: Real To Unreal
self_projects.description: Bridging real and virtual worlds through interaction design and artificial intelligence.
